data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Miglio, Laura Tavares, Bonaldo, Alexandre Bragio (2011): On a second species of Envia Ott & Höfer, 2003 (Araneae, Microstigmatidae), with notes on the sympatric type species. Zootaxa 2971: 33-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278245
